info.title: supernotes
info.description: The Supernotes API – a modern and fast API for quick card creation

post.description:
The "base query" for retrieving cards (memberships) – supports selecting, filtering, and
ordering by any implemented metric

NOTE: This is a "POST-GET" endpoint – the method is POST (for the payload) but it GETs data

schema.title: Response  Get Selected Cards V1 Cards Get Select Post

post.description:
Get the full card memberships of all the card IDs passed in the request body

NOTE: This is a "POST-GET" endpoint – the method is POST (for the payload) but it GETs data

schema.title: Response  Get Specified Cards V1 Cards Get Specify Post

post.description: Get the full card memberships for any cards that have changed since `since_when`

schema.title: Response  Get Cards Since V1 Cards Get Since Post

get.description: Get a list of recently deleted card IDs for this user

schema.title: Response  Get Deleted Cards V1 Cards Get Deleted Get

post.description: Create a single card with the minimum amount of data required
Create cards with full control over properties

schema.title: Response  Create Cards V1 Cards Post

patch.description: Update many cards in one call

schema.title: Response  Update Cards V1 Cards Patch

put.description:
Enroll in a card – the current user will be given access to all child cards(that have been
published) within the specified card. If the user has already enrolled, this endpoint will
return all child cards to provide idempotency.

schema.title: Response  Enroll In Card V1 Cards Enroll  Card Id  Put

post.description: Completely remove access to cards for the current user

schema.title: Response  Remove Cards For Me V1 Cards Remove Post

post.description: Completely (and irreversibly) delete cards from the Supernotes platform

schema.title: Response  Delete Cards For Everyone V1 Cards Delete Post

patch.description: Sets multiple preferences for the user

put.description: Sets a boolean preference flag for the user
Sets a boolean feature preview flag for the user

get.description: Check if using a valid authentication token and return the associated User ID
Check if the access token is 'fresh' and return the associated User ID
Get the authenticated user's information, including subscription details

put.description: Update the authenticated user's personal information

put.summary: Update Current User Bio And Pic
put.description: Update a public user's profile bio and image

schema.title: Response  Get Pins V1 User Pins Get

put.description: Modify which cards the user has 'pinned'

schema.title: Response  Put Pins V1 User Pins Put

get.description: Get all tags known to the user

schema.title: Response  Get Users Tags V1 Tags Get

get.description: Get the authenticated user's public profile
Get the public profiles for all card owners the current user knows

schema.title: Response  Get Known Owner Profiles V1 Profiles Known Get

get.description: Get the specified user's public profile

post.description: Get the public profiles for a specified list of users

schema.title: Response  Get Specified User Profiles V1 Profiles Specify Post

get.description: Get all comments for the specified card

schema.title: Response  Get Comments V1 Comments  Card Id  Get

post.description: Create a new comment on the specified card

put.description: Update the specified comment on the specified card

delete.description: Delete the specified comment from the specified card

get.description: Get data about members of this card (permissions, statuses, etc)

schema.title: Response  Get Members V1 Members  Card Id  Get

post.description: Attempt to join a card (based on having access to some arbitrary ancestor card)
Invite a friend directly to an existing card

schema.title: Response  Modify Member V1 Members  Card Id   Target User Id  Put

delete.description: Delete the member from the specified card

schema.title: Response  Get Friends V1 Friends Get
Response  Get Incoming Requests V1 Friends Incoming Get
Response  Get Outgoing Requests V1 Friends Outgoing Get
Response  Delete Friendship V1 Friends  Other User Id  Delete
Response  Get Share Codes For Card V1 Sharing  Card Id  Get

post.description: Create a new share code (if user has permission)

put.description: Modify an existing share code (if user has permission)

delete.description: Delete an existing share code (if user has permission)

get.description: Retrieve card data (and share code metadata) by specifying a share code.

get.summary: Authed Find Card With Share Code
get.description:
Retrieve card data (and share code metadata) by specifying a share code.
Check for auth headers and if the user already has access to this card, return a 409 error.

post.description: Join a card via share code (if allowed)

get.description: Get all templates for this user

schema.title: Response  Get All Templates V1 Templates Get

get.description: Get all API keys for the user

schema.title: Response  Get User Api Keys V1 Keys Get

put.description: Modify an API key for the user

post.description: Create a new API key for the user
Delete an API key for the user
Create a new email-sending key for a user

schema.title: Response  Get User Webhooks V1 Webhooks Get
